sect1.title: RECORDOF

row.entry: The set of data records whose RECORD structure to use. This may be a DATASET or any derived recordset.

sect1.para: The RECORDOF declaration specifies use of just the record layout of the recordset in those situations where you need to inherit the structure of the fields but not their default values, such as child DATASET declarations inside RECORD structures.
This function allows you to keep RECORD structures local to the DATASET whose layout they define and still be able to reference the structure (only, without default values) where needed.
